title: Market share of leading smartphone brands in the Netherlands 2017 to 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market Share on the Y-axis for 7 different Races for 2 groups 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
For Race Samsung, 2017 had the highest Market Share 41.0 among the 2 groups and in Sony, 2018 had the lowest Market Share 0.0.
There is a gap of 38.0 between the highest and lowest Market Share found for 2018 in Race Samsung and Sony.
On average, the Race Samsung had the highest Market Share for all 2 groups 2017, and 2018. Whereas Microsoft had the lowest average Market Share.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market Share.
Race Samsung had the maximum Market Share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Market Share was observed in Race Sony for 2018.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market Share on the Y-axis for 7 different Races for 2 groups 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
For Race Samsung, 2017 had the highest Market Share 41.0 among the 2 groups and in Sony, 2018 had the lowest Market Share 0.0.
There is a gap of 38.0 between the highest and lowest Market Share found for 2018 in Race Samsung and Sony.
On average, the Race Samsung had the highest Market Share for all 2 groups 2017, and 2018. Whereas Microsoft had the lowest average Market Share.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market Share.
For Race Samsung, 2017 had the highest Market Share 41.0 among the 2 groups and in Sony, 2018 had the lowest Market Share 0.0.
For Race Samsung, 2018 had the highest Market Share among all 7 Races and it has the lowest Market Share in Race Sony.
The maximum Market Share for 2018 that was found in Race Samsung was 0 times larger than the minimum Market Share observed in Race Sony.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Market Share was found in case of 2017.
On average, the Race Samsung had the highest Market Share for all 2 groups 2017, and 2018. Whereas Microsoft had the lowest average Market Share.
